trigger.match: ^You remove \d+ (\w+)(?: from the rift)?\, bringing the total in the rift to \d+\.$
trigger.name: apply_now__

trigger.match: ^You chew an arnica bud\, then spread it on your (head|chest|arms|legs)\.$
trigger.name: applied_arnica__

trigger.match: ^You take out some healing potion and quickly rub it on your (head|chest|gut|arms|legs)\.$
trigger.name: applied_health__

trigger.match: ^You take out some (\w+) (?:salve|oil) and quickly rub it on your (head|chest|gut|arms|legs|skin)\.$
trigger.name: applied_salve__

trigger.match: ^I don\'t see the container here from which you wish to apply some salve\.$
trigger.name: applied_missing_salve__

trigger.match: ^(.+?) turns to ash in your mouth\, and you spit it out\.$
trigger.name: ate_herb_ash__

trigger.match: ^The herb has no effect\.$
trigger.name: ate_herb_failed__

trigger.match: ^The plant has no effect\.$
trigger.name: ate_herb_offbal__

trigger.match: ^The berry has no effect\.$
trigger.name: ate_sparkleberry_failed__

trigger.match: ^You direct .+? towards the \w+\,? and blow mightily at .+?\.
trigger.name: blew_blasthorn__

trigger.match: ^You hold .+? to your lips\, blowing a few upbeat notes that pierce the air\. As the notes fade\, you feel yourself uplifted and your confidence increases\.$
trigger.name: blew_goldenhorn__

trigger.match: ^You hold .+? to your lips\, blowing a long\, bellowing note that lingers in the air\. As the note fades\, it is replaced by the scurrying sound of vermin\.$
trigger.name: blew_piperhorn__

trigger.match: ^(?:Taking advantage of natural rocks and depressions\, you begin to pull yourself up the side|You begin to climb out) of the pit\.$
trigger.name: climbing_pit__

trigger.match: ^(?:You can climb no higher|You cannot climb up the side of a pit you are not in)\.$
trigger.name: climbing_pit_false__

trigger.match: ^You carefully watch your footing and shimmy down from the treetops\.$
trigger.name: climbing_down__

trigger.match: ^You reach upwards and concentrate on finding a sturdy branch\, then lift yourself up with relative ease\.$
trigger.name: climbing_into_trees__

trigger.match: ^You exert superior mental control and your wounds clot before your eyes\.$
trigger.name: clotted__

trigger.match: ^You carefully crank up (.+?) and hold it up as it begins to play\. (?:Mentally jarring|Sickly|Sombre) notes rise up from \1 as an? (?:azure|emerald|golden) glow radiates outwards? from it to engulf all nearby\.$
trigger.name: cranked_enchant__

trigger.match: ^You remove \d+ (\w+)(?: from the rift)?\, bringing the total in the rift to \d+\.$
trigger.name: eat_now__

trigger.match: ^You eat (.+?)\.$
trigger.name: ate_herb__

trigger.match: ^You (take a drink|down the last drop) of (.+?) from (an? .*?(?:vial|bottle|stein|teapot).*?)\.$
trigger.name: elixir_sipped__

trigger.match: ^What is it that you wish to drink\?$
trigger.name: elixir_missing_vial__

trigger.match: ^The allheale burns your throat and makes your eyes water\.$
trigger.name: sipped_allheale__

trigger.match: ^The potion heals and soothes you\.$
trigger.name: sipped_health__

trigger.match: ^(?:Your mind feels stronger and more alert|Ah\, the soothing bromides help strengthen your ego)\.$
trigger.name: sipped_mana_bromide__

trigger.match: ^You begin focusing your mind on your motor skills\.$
trigger.name: focused_body__

trigger.match: ^You focus your mind on your motor skills but find you are already mobile\.$
trigger.name: focused_body_none__
trigger.send: if flags.get("focus_try") then cures.clear("focus body") flags.clear{"focusing", "focus_try"} bals.gain("focus") end

trigger.match: ^You attempt to (?:regain your sanity|control the warping of time around you)\.$
trigger.name: focused_mind_special__

trigger.match: ^You focus your mind intently on curing your mental maladies\.$
trigger.name: focused_mind__

trigger.match: ^You focus your mind intently on curing your spiritual maladies\.$
trigger.name: focused_spirit__

trigger.match: ^You clench your abdomen and release\, causing your stomach to growl hungrily\.$
trigger.name: hungered__

trigger.match: ^The jitterbug overcomes you\, and you spit out the herb so you can dance without choking\.$
trigger.name: jitterbug_herb__

trigger.match: ^You feel an invigorating energy rush through you\.$
trigger.name: read_healing_blackedout__

trigger.match: ^You read a Scroll of Healing\.$
trigger.name: read_healing_scroll__

trigger.match: ^You read a Scroll of Protection\.$
trigger.name: read_protection_scroll__

trigger.match: ^You read a Scroll of Curses to ([A-Z][a-z]+)\.$
trigger.name: read_curses_scroll__

trigger.match: ^You read a Scroll of Curses to ([A-Z][a-z]+)\.$
trigger.name: read_disruption_scroll__

trigger.match: ^You read a magic tome\.$
trigger.name: read_magic_tome__

trigger.match: ^You read a magic tome to ([A-Z][a-z]+)\.$
trigger.name: read_magic_tome_target__

trigger.match: ^You (?:rub .+? and (?:it|they) begins? to glow with a pulsating light|point .+?\, and sparks fly out of (?:it|them))\.$
trigger.name: rubbed_enchant__

trigger.match: [Ww]arm water showers down upon (you|[A-Z][a-z]+)(.+?)\.$
trigger.name: rubbed_enchant_cleanse__

trigger.match: ^(?:Calling upon the powers of the wind\, you cause a sudden gust to sweep through the room|A gust of wind rises to push [A-Z][a-z]+ out to the \w+)\.$
trigger.name: rubbed_enchant_gust__

trigger.match: ^An icewall rises up to the \w+\.$
trigger.name: rubbed_enchant_icewall__

trigger.match: ^(?:Flames erupt on ([hH](?:is|er)) skin\, blistering \1 flesh|The icewall to the \w+ quickly melts as you ignite it)\.$
trigger.name: rubbed_enchant_ignite__

trigger.match: ^(?:You|He|She) begins? to rapidly (shrink|grow) in size\.$
trigger.name: rubbed_enchant_size__

trigger.match: ^You tug at the cosmic fabric that binds [A-Z][a-z]+\,? in an effort to send [hH](?:im|er) to sleep\.$
trigger.name: rubbed_enchant_sleep__

trigger.match: ^Sticky strands of webbing spray out to cover [A-Z][a-z]+\.$
trigger.name: rubbed_enchant_web__

trigger.match: ^(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ jumps aside\, avoiding your blow|The sparks quickly fizzle out as the spell fails)\.$
trigger.name: rubbed_enchant_fail__

trigger.match: ^You rub .*?(?:prayer beads|hairpin).*? and (?:it|they) begins? to glow with a pulsating light\.$
trigger.name: rubbed_focus_charm__

trigger.match: ^You rub a medicine bag against your (chest|head|gut|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg)\, allowing the healing properties of the herbs inside to soak through your flesh\.$
trigger.name: rubbed_medbag__

trigger.match: ^You rub yourself a bit with a medicine bag\, to no effect\.$
trigger.name: rubbed_medbag2__

trigger.match: ^You vigou?rously scrub off the slimy muco?us that covers you\.$
trigger.name: cure_scrub_mucous__

trigger.match: ^You begin to vigou?rously scrub yourself all over\, trying to remove that sticky sap\.$
trigger.name: cure_scrub_sap__

trigger.match: ^You begin to vigou?rously scrub yourself all over\, trying to remove that awful mud caked all over your body\.$
trigger.name: cure_scrub_muddy__

trigger.match: ^You scrub yourself vigou?rously and wash away the horrible ectoplasm\.$
trigger.name: cure_scrub_ectoplasm__

trigger.match: ^You begin to vigou?rously scrub yourself all over\, trying to remove that horrible stench\.$
trigger.name: cure_scrub_stinky__

trigger.match: ^You begin to vigou?rously scrub yourself all over\, trying to remove that vile black gunk\.$
trigger.name: cure_scrub_gunk__

trigger.match: ^You begin to vigou?rously scrub yourself all over\, trying to remove that slippery oil that coats your skin\.$
trigger.name: cure_scrub_slickness__

trigger.match: ^You begin to vigorously scrub yourself all over as you attempt to remove the dark mark from your skin\.$
trigger.name: cure_scrub_deathmarks__

trigger.match: ^You scrub yourself vigou?rously until you feel squeaky clean\.$
trigger.name: cure_scrub_clean__

trigger.match: ^The brew you drank lies flat on your palate\.$
trigger.name: sipped_brew_offbal__

trigger.match: ^In a swift\, fluid motion\, you spring up from your hands to land crouched on your feet\.$
trigger.name: sprangup__

trigger.match: ^You enter a stance to protect your (\w+).*?\.$
trigger.name: stance_enter__

trigger.match: ^(?:You step out of your defensive fighting stance|You cease using a defensive stance for combat)\.$
trigger.name: stance_none__

trigger.match: ^(?:You stand straight up|You stand up and stretch your arms out wide|You are not fallen or kneeling|You get up off .+?)\.$
trigger.name: stood__

trigger.match: ^You touch your medicine bag and feel your wounds close and heal\.$
trigger.name: touched_medbag__

trigger.match: ^You touch your medicine bag but feel (nothing) happen\.$
trigger.name: touched_medbag2__

trigger.match: ^(?:You call upon your physical training and transmute your mana into pure health|You do not have that much mana to transmute)\.$
trigger.name: transmuted__

trigger.match: ^You begin to tumble (agilely to the (\w+)|towards the ground)\.$
trigger.name: tumbling__

trigger.match: ^You tumble (out of the room|precariously towards the ground)\.$
trigger.name: tumbled__

trigger.match: ^(?:There is no exit in that direction|A door impedes your progress)\.$
trigger.name: tumble_fail__

trigger.match: ^You begin your struggle to escape from the dreamworld\.$
trigger.name: waking__

trigger.match: ^You quickly wind (.+?) up as tightly as you can\. As you finish\, \1\'s face glows softly\, and ethereal\,? blue text materializes in the air in front of your face\.$
trigger.name: wound_revelations__

trigger.match: ^You (?:begin to struggle free of|twist and turn as you attempt to escape from) your entanglement\.$
trigger.name: writhing_entangle__

trigger.match: ^You begin trying to wrest your mind free of that which has transfixed it\.$
trigger.name: writhing_transfix__

trigger.match: ^You begin to wrench your (?:left|right) arm from the mutt\'s mouth\.$
trigger.name: writhing_clamp__

trigger.match: ^You begin to writhe furiously to escape (?:from the iron cross|the antlers that have impaled you|the blade that has impaled you(?:r (?:left|right) foot)?)\.$
trigger.name: writhing_impale__

trigger.match: ^You struggle to free your limbs from the thorny vines\.$
trigger.name: writhing_vines__

trigger.match: ^You struggle to free yourself from being hoisted in the air\.$
trigger.name: writhing_hoist__

trigger.match: ^You twist and turn as you struggle to break free of the ropes that bind you\.$
trigger.name: writhing_ropes__

trigger.match: ^You twist and turn as you struggle to break free of the shackles that bind you\.$
trigger.name: writhing_shackles__

trigger.match: ^You twist and turn as you struggle to break free of the grapple that holds you\.$
trigger.name: writhing_grapple__

trigger.match: ^You strain against the bindings that have you painfully trussed up\.$
trigger.name: writhing_truss__
